Content.Name: Stomach & Digestive
Content.Title: Stomach, Diarrhea, Constipation, Gas and Nausea
Content.Abstract: Stomach, Diarrhea, Constipation, Gas and Nausea
Content.BodyCopy:
Stomach & Digestive
  • Enema:
    Relieves occasional constipation
    comparable to Fleet ® Enema
  • Maximum Strength Gas Relief :
    Relieves bloating, pressure and fullness commonly referred to as gas
    comparable to Mylanta: Gas Relief®
  • Glycerin Suppositories:
    Relieves occasional constipation
  • Natural Fiber:
    Effective in treating occasional constipation and restoring regularity
    comparable to Metamucil®
  • Dairy Aid:
    Makes dairy foods more digestible
    comparable to Lactaid®
  • Magnesium Citrate:
    For relief of occasional constipation
  • Milk of Magnesia:
    Relieves occasional constipation
  • Docusate Sodium:
    Relieves occasional constipation, stool softener
    comparable to Colace®
  • Bisacodyl:
    Relieves occasional constipation and irregularity
    comparable to Dulcolax®
  • Bonine:
    Prevents and treats nausea, vomiting, or dizziness due to motion sickness
  • PEG 3350:
    Relieves occasional constipation (irregularity)
    comparable to Miralax®
  • Complete Acid Reducer + Antacid:
    Relieves heartburn associated with acid indigestion and sour stomach
    comparable to Pepcid Complete®
  • Bismatrol:
    Relieves diarrhea, heartburn, indigestion, nausea, upset stomach associated with these symptoms
    comparable to Pepto-Bismol®
  • Anti-Nausea Liquid:
    Relieves nausea due to upset stomach from intestinal flu, stomach flu, and food or drink indiscretions
    comparable to Emetrol®
  • Urinary Pain Relief:
    Provides temporary relief from urinary pain, burning, urgency and frequency associated with urinary tract infections
    comparable to AZO Standard®
  • Omeprazole:
    Treats frequent heartburn (occurs 2 or more days a week), not intended for immediate relief of heartburn
    comparable to Prilosec OTC®
  • Motion Sickness Tab:
    For prevention and treatment of nausea, vomiting and dizziness associated with motion sickness
    comparable to Dramamine®
  • Ranitidine 150:
    Relieves heartburn associated with acid indigestion and sour stomach, prevents heartburn associated with acid indigestion and sour stomach brought on by certain foods and beverages
    comparable to Zantac 150®
  • Lansoprazole 24HR:
    Treats frequent heartburn (occurs 2 or more days a week), not intended for immediate relief of heartburn
    comparable to Prevacid® 24HR
  • Hemorrhoidal Ointment:
    Helps relieve the local itching and discomfort associated with hemorrhoids, temporarily shrinks hemorrhoidal tissue and relieves burning, temporarily provides a coating for relief of anorectal discomforts, temporarily protects the inflamed, irritated anorectal surface to help make bowel movements less painful
    comparable to Preparation H®
  • Hemorrhoidal Hygiene Pads:
    For immediate relief from itching, burning and irritation
    comparable to Tucks®
